price: Na nyinyi mkimt'ii mtu kama nyinyi basi hakika mtakuwa khasarani.
arabic: وَلَئِنۡ أَطَعۡتُم بَشَرٗا مِّثۡلَكُمۡ إِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّخَٰسِرُونَ
footnotes: Na wakawahadharisha kwa nguvu na mkazo, wakiwaambia: Mkimt'ii mtu aliye kama nyinyi kwa utu wake, basi nyinyi hakika mtakuwa mmekhasiri kwa kuwa hamtapata manufaa yo yote mkimfuata.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wala-in aṭaʿtum basharan mith'lakum innakum idhan lakhāsirūna
